Tried using internal IDT sound card instead of external Sound Blaster X-Fi. Manually assigned High Performance mode. Tried compatibility mode. NOTHING WORKS!!! Score: 0/10 Yep it's a natural disaster alright.Updated: 2017-01-02 2355hrsOMG!! Good grief! This thingamajig actually works!! Woohoo!


YouTube™ Video: Helicopter 2015: Natural Disasters - 01 Tutorial 

			Views: 37		

			This game actually works with laptop GPU people ! ! ! Laptop GPU IS NOT supported as stated in the system requirements and this game has a very bad rating in Steam reviews mainly because most people...		

All ya had to do was move the movie, thats it! I'm changing it to recommend based on the fact that i had enjoyed and completed the 2014 version. This game has the same engine and user interface minus the achievements that is in 2014 version. The only differences so far i see are the helicopters and maps. I suppose the missions would be different too.A little disappointed that there are no achievements or trading cards but i'm sorta a maverick who likes to prove everybody's wrong haha! Naah actually the bundle is cheap and all the other games works without a hassel so i was willing to take a gamble and unwilling to refund the whole bundle just because of one troublesome title.It's all good now back to the skies. Oh wait! dang so many other titles waiting to be tested. Maybe i'll get back to this a little later.
